req_description: Verify that Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) is enabled for accessing developer laptops and critical systems
cwe_description: Use of Single-Factor Authentication;Improper Authentication - Weak authentication mechanisms

req_description: Verify that all identities (human and programmatic) are managed through a centralized Identity Provider (IdP)
cwe_description: Improper Authentication - Inconsistent authentication mechanisms

req_description: Verify all tools in documented software pipeline follow access permisions as it relates to principle of least privilage
cwe_description: Execution with Unnecessary Privileges - Excessive permissions

req_description: Verify that stale identities are disabled or removed after a predetermined period of inactivity
cwe_description: Improper Authentication - Failure to manage authentication lifecycle

req_description: Verify service account tokens are reviewed for over-permissioning in both VCS and pipeline tool/secret store
cwe_description: CWE-266: Incorrect Privilege Assignment; CWE-732: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource;

req_description: Verify Version Control System requires MFA for all users

req_description: Verify Quarterly audit on Version Control System administrators

req_description: Verify that secrets are encrypted both at rest and in transit

req_description: Verify Endpoint Protection is running

req_description: Verify Endpoint Protection is set to routinely update

req_description: Verify Full Disk encryption is setup and enabled on developer laptops

req_description: Verify Patch Management is setup and enabled on developer laptops

req_description: Verify that developer machines are configured to lock automatically after a period of inactivity
